actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide for the position of Assistant United States Trade Representative for Small Business.
short_title: Small Business Export Enhancement Act of 2000
subjects: Office of the U.S. Trade Representative

summary.text: Small Business Export Enhancement Act of 2000 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to establish in the Office of the United States Trade Representative (USTR) the position of Assistant USTR for Small Business to promote the trade interests of small businesses, remove foreign trade barriers that impede small business exporters, and enforce existing trade agreements beneficial to small businesses.

titles.title: Small Business Export Enhancement Act of 2000
To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to provide for the position of Assistant United States Trade Representative for Small Business.
